name: Stunt Racing - Extreme Moto Trials
description:
Stunt Racing - Extreme Moto Trials is coming! Enjoy the extreme challenge of global rivals!

Game Features:
- 90 well-designed levels in beautiful scenes
- Riders of different nature and Motos with various styles
- Switch control mode easily between tilt and button
- plenty of Missions coming soon
- Jumps, loopings, walls, rocks, half-pipes, etc.
- both Single Player mode & Multiplayer mode
- Stunt Racing Championship mode

Stunt Racing - Extreme Moto Trials, the world's coolest 2D xtreme moto racing game now gives you the real fun of challenging!

Strap on your helmet and crank back the throttle cos this physics-based moto-stunt fest has it all - ramps, half-pipes, collapsing platforms, falling rocks and swinging traps, all of which can all lead to bone-jarring wipeouts! Express yourself with awesome stunts like big air, backflips and wheelies!

Any problem or suggestion to our Stunt Racing - Extreme Moto Trials, please send email to: support@ae-mobile.com

No one can block the brave. Come on, jumping with your bike!
Let's go for Stunt Racing right now!
